description: CI quality gate configuration for fast CLAP-based validation

notes.clap_quality_min: Minimum CLAP quality score (0-100). 50 is a reasonable baseline.
notes.thd_max_percent: Maximum THD before failing. 20% is lenient for varied module types.
notes.clipping_max_percent: Maximum clipping before failing. 5% allows some headroom.
notes.hnr_min_db: Minimum harmonic-to-noise ratio. -5 dB is lenient for noisy modules.
notes.peak_amplitude_min: Minimum peak amplitude to pass (detect silent modules).
notes.silent_output: If true, allow silent output (for utility modules).
